entities.name: barty crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is mentioned as a Minister and his personal history is discussed. He is also referred to as having gone wandering off somewhere.

entities.name: alastor
entities.description: Alastor is the nickname of Moody, and he is referred to by Fudge in their conversation.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Fudge is a Minister who is discussing Barty Crouch's disappearance with Alastor (Moody).

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is calmly responding to Fudge's concerns about Barty Crouch's disappearance.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who has a 'monster fixation' and is referred to by Dumbledore in his defense of Hagrid.

entities.name: beauxbatons carriage
entities.description: The Beauxbatons carriage is where Barty Crouch was found, according to Fudge.

relationships.description: Fudge and Dumbledore have a disagreement about the disappearance of Barty Crouch.
The Beauxbatons carriage is where Fudge believes Barty Crouch was found.
Dumbledore defends Hagrid against Fudge's accusations of having a 'monster fixation'.
